title: Understanding the Importance of Religious Practices
text: Consider how a client's religious beliefs might influence their health practices and decisions.

title: Building Interventions
text: Think about how knowing a client's religious practices can help in creating personalized care plans.

hintAnswer: to build interventions around the client’s beliefs in health practices and allows nurses to utilize all of the resources that a client may have at their disposal.
